branchCategory.name: CG3
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CG3 double acting, single rod cylinder now offers a space saving, compact cylinder.&nbsp; With eight bore sizes it can meet&nbsp;any application need.&nbsp; It is now possible to select either a male or female thread to the standard model.&nbsp; Five mounting options are available.&nbsp; Auto switch capable.&nbsp; RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)G3, Double Acting, Single Rod, Short Type
branchItem.description: <p>Series CG3 double acting, single rod cylinder now offers a space saving, compact cylinder.&nbsp; With eight bore sizes it can meet&nbsp;any application need.&nbsp; It is now possible to select either a male or female thread to the standard model.&nbsp; Five mounting options are available.&nbsp; Auto switch capable.&nbsp; RoHS compliant.</p>
